High Summoner Galatea:
Good job! You have won 6 Arcana Cards! This is remarkable! You are the first apprentice Summoner to bring back all 6 cards so quickly! Quite frankly, I doubted whether you would succeed... My worries were for nothing!
You have passed the Trial of the Summoner! Congratulations! I shall give you the 'Mark of the Summoner'. With your talent you will become an excellent summoner. Perhaps one day you will hold one of the Major Arcana Cards...
